Posts.Content: in march of this year i had a power port placed in my chest for chemo treatments.  my chemo was completed on august 7 2009.  i still have the port.  yesterday my neck started to hurt me.  it was hard for me to turn it.  now the port area is aching.  its not unbearable but it is annoying.  what could be causing this?  i have not had the port accessed since august 7.
Posts.Title: power port area hurting
